scripts.text:
USE SERVERLESSDB1

if EXISTS (Select * from sys.external_tables where name='movieabove65ET')
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE "movieabove65ET"

if NOT EXISTS(Select * from sys.external_tables where name='movieabove65ET')
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[movieabove65ET]
(
	 [FILM] VARCHAR(100),
	 [GENRE] VARCHAR(50),
	 [LEAD STUDIO] VARCHAR(75),
	 [AUDIENCE SCORE] INT,
	 [PROFITABILITY] DECIMAL,
	 [ROTTEN TOMATOES] INT,
	 [WORLD WIDE GROSS] MONEY,
	 [YEAR] INT,
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/movies/above65/*.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [DS3],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CsvFormat2]
)
